Data Directory¶

pyproj.datadir.get_data_dir¶

pyproj.datadir.get_data_dir()[source]¶

The order of preference for the data directory is:

  1. The one set by pyproj.datadir.set_data_dir (if exists & valid)

  2. The internal proj directory (if exists & valid)

  3. The directory in PROJ_LIB (if exists & valid)

  4. The directory on the PATH (if exists & valid)

Returns

str

Return type

The valid data directory.

pyproj.datadir.set_data_dir¶

pyproj.datadir.set_data_dir(proj_data_dir)[source]¶

Set the data directory for PROJ.4 to use.

Parameters

proj_data_dir (str) – The path to rhe PROJ.4 data directory.

pyproj.datadir.append_data_dir¶

pyproj.datadir.append_data_dir(proj_data_dir)[source]¶

Add an additional data directory for PROJ.4 to use.

Parameters

proj_data_dir (str) – The path to rhe PROJ.4 data directory.
